description: Mao, who has lost her confidence after being told that Hana has been somewhat different recently, is paid a visit by the ladylike Kyōko who is admired by all the students. Her identity is, surprisingly, the rock idol Beat! Mao is surprised at the gap, but while spending the day with the girl who enjoys Aikatsu! her way, she comes to realize something important.

titles.title: やまとなでしこロック変化
